defeat.\""},{"lineNumber":237095,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ザンス選手と乱義選手が決勝で相まみえるか！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Were Zansu and Rangiku going to meet in the final!?"},{"lineNumber":237096,"originalJapaneseLine":"　と、予想していたので私もとっても意外でした」","translatedEnglishLine":"That was my prediction too, so I was very surprised.\""},{"lineNumber":237097,"originalJapaneseLine":"「トトカルチョ売り場では悲鳴が轟きまくったらしいですよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"They say screams echoed constantly at the Toto Calcio sales huh?\""},{"lineNumber":237103,"originalJapaneseLine":"「試合は明後日です。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The matches are the day after games.\""},{"lineNumber":237105,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それでは、今日はこんなところでお別れです。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then, that’s all for today."},{"lineNumber":237106,"originalJapaneseLine":"　明日のまたこの時間にお会いしましょう」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let’s meet again at this time armor,"},{"lineNumber":237109,"originalJapaneseLine":"　売ります買います買わせます、","translatedEnglishLine":"  buying, selling, and making you buy,"},{"lineNumber":237110,"originalJapaneseLine":"　しゃも二郎商店の提供でお送りしました」","translatedEnglishLine":"Shamo Jiro Shop.\""},{"lineNumber":237111,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"……"},{"lineNumber":237112,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"…"},{"lineNumber":237113,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなた達は久し振りに皆で集まって","translatedEnglishLine":"You gloomy."},{"lineNumber":237117,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まさか……ザンスと乱義が負けるとはなあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No way... that Zansu and Rangiku would but"},{"lineNumber":237120,"originalJapaneseLine":"　顔出さねぇし……どうしたんだろ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"he didn’t show up... I wonder what’s wrong...\""},{"lineNumber":237121,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ、それならね……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, if that’s the case..."},{"lineNumber":237122,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ザンスちゃん一人で修行するって迷宮に」","translatedEnglishLine":"Zansu-chan went to the labyrinth to train alone.\""},{"lineNumber":237123,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へ？　そうなん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? Is that so?\""},{"lineNumber":237124,"originalJapaneseLine":"「負けたら更に強くなる為に修行。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"After losing, he trains to become even stronger."},{"lineNumber":237125,"originalJapaneseLine":"　分かりやすい奴だからな」","translatedEnglishLine":"He’s pretty straightforward like that.\""},{"lineNumber":237126,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それに……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Besides..."},{"lineNumber":237127,"originalJapaneseLine":"　荒れてるところを皆に見せたくないんだろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"he probably doesn’t want everyone to see him upset."},{"lineNumber":237128,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今日は放っておいてやろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let’s just leave him alone today.\""},{"lineNumber":237129,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、お腹空いたら来るでしょ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, he’ll probably come if he gets hungry.\""},{"lineNumber":237130,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんなわんわんみたいな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That sounds like a puppy dog...\""},{"lineNumber":237131,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それより問題はやっぱり――","translatedEnglishLine":"\"More importantly, the real problem is—\""},{"lineNumber":237132,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah...\""},{"lineNumber":237133,"originalJapaneseLine":"皆の視線が乱義とナギに集中する。","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone’s gaze focused on Rangiku and Nagi."},{"lineNumber":237134,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":237135,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いやー、まいったまいった」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Man, I’m really beaten.\""},{"lineNumber":237136,"originalJapaneseLine":"呪いにより目が見えなくなった乱義と、","translatedEnglishLine":"Rangiku, who had lost his sight because of a curse,"},{"lineNumber":237137,"originalJapaneseLine":"妙に明るいハニ子が並んでいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"stood alongside the unusually cheerful Haniko."},{"lineNumber":237138,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、明るいね……ナギお姉ちゃん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, you’re so bright... Nagi-oneechan...\""},{"lineNumber":237139,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まっ、長い人生、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, in a long life,"},{"lineNumber":237140,"originalJapaneseLine":"　呪いでハニ子になることもあるって。","translatedEnglishLine":"sometimes you end up turning into Haniko because of a curse."},{"lineNumber":237141,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あっはっはっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ahahaha.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんでも大会に参加してから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Apparently, since participating in the tournament,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 信者が十人も増えたらしいですよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it seems like he’s gained as many as ten followers."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「エロ親父ばっか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mostly lecherous old men?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ、これが意外にも女性ばかり」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, surprisingly, they’re mostly women."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「分からん……ホンマによう分からん……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don’t get it… I really don’t understand…"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて、それではトーナメント表を確認しましょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, let’s check the tournament bracket."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほいほい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sure sure."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ベスト8のメンバー同士が戦い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The best 8 members face off,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ブロック代表者の4名はこのようになりました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the four representatives of each block are as follows."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふむふむ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm hmm…"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この結果をどう思いますか、コパンドンさん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What do you think of these results, Copandon-san?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やっぱり今回意外やったんは、魔王の子二人、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What was really surprising this time were the two children of the Demon Lord,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてアームズはんの敗退やね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and also Arms-san’s defeat."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ザンス選手と乱義選手が決勝で相まみえるか！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Were Zansu and Rangiku going to meet in the final!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と、予想していたので私もとっても意外でした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was my prediction too, so I was very surprised."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「トトカルチョ売り場では悲鳴が轟きまくったらしいですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They say screams echoed constantly at the Toto Calcio sales booths."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんたって優勝候補の三人やったからね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "After all, those were the three favorites to win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大波乱の準々決勝いうところか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You could say the quarterfinals were full of big upsets."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「代わりに勝ち上がった全員、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "All those who won instead,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それだけの実力を有しているってことや」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: have that much skill."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「次の試合も目が離せんって感じかな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Looks like we can’t take our eyes off the next matches either, huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「試合は明後日です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The matches are the day after tomorrow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二つの試合、皆さんも楽しみにしましょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let’s all look forward to the two games."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それでは、今日はこんなところでお別れです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, that’s all for today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 明日のまたこの時間にお会いしましょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let’s meet again at this time tomorrow."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちゃんとお風呂に入ってから寝ぇや〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Make sure to take a proper bath before going to sleep~"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この番組は、武器に防具に世色癌、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This program was brought to you by Shamo Jiro Shop, selling weapons, armor,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 売ります買います買わせます、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: buying, selling, and making you buy,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しゃも二郎商店の提供でお送りしました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shamo Jiro Shop."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなた達は久し振りに皆で集まって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You all gathered together for the first time in a while

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 酒場で食事を取っていた――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and were having a meal at the tavern—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 筈なのだが、メンバーはやや少なく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or so it should have been, but the members were a bit few,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雰囲気も暗かった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the atmosphere was gloomy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まさか……ザンスと乱義が負けるとはなあ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No way... that Zansu and Rangiku would lose..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ザンスなんて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As for Zansu,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日はみんなで飯食うって話だったのに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we were supposed to eat together today, but

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 顔出さねぇし……どうしたんだろ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he didn’t show up... I wonder what’s wrong..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、それならね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, if that’s the case...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンスちゃん一人で修行するって迷宮に」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zansu-chan went to the labyrinth to train alone."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へ？　そうなん？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? Is that so?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「負けたら更に強くなる為に修行。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "After losing, he trains to become even stronger.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 分かりやすい奴だからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He’s pretty straightforward like that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それに……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Besides...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 荒れてるところを皆に見せたくないんだろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he probably doesn’t want everyone to see him upset.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日は放っておいてやろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let’s just leave him alone today."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、お腹空いたら来るでしょ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, he’ll probably come if he gets hungry."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなわんわんみたいな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That sounds like a puppy dog..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それより問題はやっぱり――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "More importantly, the real problem is—"
"Yeah..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆の視線が乱義とナギに集中する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone’s gaze focused on Rangiku and Nagi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いやー、まいったまいった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Man, I’m really beaten."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呪いにより目が見えなくなった乱義と、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rangiku, who had lost his sight because of a curse,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 妙に明るいハニ子が並んでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: stood alongside the unusually cheerful Haniko.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、明るいね……ナギお姉ちゃん……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, you’re so bright... Nagi-oneechan..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まっ、長い人生、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, in a long life,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呪いでハニ子になることもあるって。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: sometimes you end up turning into Haniko because of a curse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっはっはっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ahahaha."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんでも大会に参加してから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Apparently, since participating in the tournament,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 信者が十人も増えたらしいですよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it seems like he’s gained as many as ten followers."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「エロ親父ばっか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mostly lecherous old men?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ、これが意外にも女性ばかり」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, surprisingly, they’re mostly women."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「分からん……ホンマによう分からん……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don’t get it… I really don’t understand…"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて、それではトーナメント表を確認しましょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, let’s check the tournament bracket."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほいほい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sure sure."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ベスト8のメンバー同士が戦い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The best 8 members face off,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ブロック代表者の4名はこのようになりました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the four representatives of each block are as follows."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふむふむ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm hmm…"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この結果をどう思いますか、コパンドンさん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What do you think of these results, Copandon-san?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やっぱり今回意外やったんは、魔王の子二人、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What was really surprising this time were the two children of the Demon Lord,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてアームズはんの敗退やね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and also Arms-san’s defeat."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ザンス選手と乱義選手が決勝で相まみえるか！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Were Zansu and Rangiku going to meet in the final!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と、予想していたので私もとっても意外でした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was my prediction too, so I was very surprised."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「トトカルチョ売り場では悲鳴が轟きまくったらしいですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They say screams echoed constantly at the Toto Calcio sales booths."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんたって優勝候補の三人やったからね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "After all, those were the three favorites to win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大波乱の準々決勝いうところか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You could say the quarterfinals were full of big upsets."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「代わりに勝ち上がった全員、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "All those who won instead,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それだけの実力を有しているってことや」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: have that much skill."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「次の試合も目が離せんって感じかな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Looks like we can’t take our eyes off the next matches either, huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「試合は明後日です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The matches are the day after tomorrow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二つの試合、皆さんも楽しみにしましょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let’s all look forward to the two games."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それでは、今日はこんなところでお別れです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, that’s all for today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 明日のまたこの時間にお会いしましょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let’s meet again at this time tomorrow."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちゃんとお風呂に入ってから寝ぇや〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Make sure to take a proper bath before going to sleep~"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この番組は、武器に防具に世色癌、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This program was brought to you by Shamo Jiro Shop, selling weapons, armor,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 売ります買います買わせます、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: buying, selling, and making you buy,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しゃも二郎商店の提供でお送りしました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shamo Jiro Shop."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなた達は久し振りに皆で集まって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You all gathered together for the first time in a while

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 酒場で食事を取っていた――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and were having a meal at the tavern—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 筈なのだが、メンバーはやや少なく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or so it should have been, but the members were a bit few,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雰囲気も暗かった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the atmosphere was gloomy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まさか……ザンスと乱義が負けるとはなあ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No way... that Zansu and Rangiku would lose..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ザンスなんて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As for Zansu,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日はみんなで飯食うって話だったのに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we were supposed to eat together today, but

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 顔出さねぇし……どうしたんだろ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he didn’t show up... I wonder what’s wrong..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、それならね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, if that’s the case...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンスちゃん一人で修行するって迷宮に」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zansu-chan went to the labyrinth to train alone."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へ？　そうなん？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? Is that so?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「負けたら更に強くなる為に修行。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "After losing, he trains to become even stronger.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 分かりやすい奴だからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He’s pretty straightforward like that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それに……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Besides...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 荒れてるところを皆に見せたくないんだろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he probably doesn’t want everyone to see him upset.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日は放っておいてやろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let’s just leave him alone today."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、お腹空いたら来るでしょ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, he’ll probably come if he gets hungry."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなわんわんみたいな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That sounds like a puppy dog..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それより問題はやっぱり――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "More importantly, the real problem is—"
"Yeah..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆の視線が乱義とナギに集中する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone’s gaze focused on Rangiku and Nagi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いやー、まいったまいった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Man, I’m really beaten."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呪いにより目が見えなくなった乱義と、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rangiku, who had lost his sight because of a curse,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 妙に明るいハニ子が並んでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: stood alongside the unusually cheerful Haniko.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、明るいね……ナギお姉ちゃん……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, you’re so bright... Nagi-oneechan..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まっ、長い人生、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, in a long life,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呪いでハニ子になることもあるって。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: sometimes you end up turning into Haniko because of a curse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっはっはっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ahahaha."
